meanings.definition: relating to or consisting of lignocellulose
meanings.sent1: The lignocellulosic structure of the plant provides strength and support.
meanings.sent2: Scientists are studying the lignocellulosic properties of wood for sustainable materials.
meanings.sent3: The lignocellulosic fibers in the tree seemed to dance in the wind.
meanings.sent4: Her words were as tough and intertwined as lignocellulosic fibers.
meanings.sent5: The house was built to last, with a lignocellulosic foundation that resisted decay.

meanings.definition: pertaining to or derived from lignocellulose
meanings.sent1: The lignocellulosic material used in the experiment showed promising results.
meanings.sent2: The company developed a new lignocellulosic process for biofuel production.
meanings.sent3: The lignocellulosic essence of the plant seemed to bring luck to the garden.
meanings.sent4: Her thoughts were as complex and interconnected as lignocellulosic components.
meanings.sent5: The air was filled with the sweet scent of lignocellulosic flowers in bloom.

meanings.sent1: The researchers analyzed the lignocellulosic to understand its properties.
meanings.sent2: The factory produced lignocellulosic for various industrial applications.
meanings.sent3: The lignocellulosic was so versatile that it could be used in many products.
meanings.sent4: The artist created a masterpiece using lignocellulosic as the main medium.
meanings.sent5: The market demand for lignocellulosic was steadily increasing due to its eco-friendly nature.
